name: Spark City
description:
See what it takes to keep shelves filled and customers satisfied in Spark City!

In the backroom and on the sales floor, simple yet effective processes help maximize On Shelf Customer Availability and Sales, while keeping the area Clean, Fast and Friendly. A fun, yet informative adventure featuring retail concepts that are actually proven to work.

Be in charge of your own area, and see what it takes to achieve successful results in Spark City
